gauss_fit¶

tessilator.lc_analysis.gauss_fit(x, a0, x_mean, sigma)[source]¶

Construct a simple Gaussian.

Return Gaussian values from a given amplitude (a0), mean (x_mean) and uncertainty (sigma) for a distribution of values

Parameters:
xIterable

list of input values

a0float

Amplitude of a Gaussian

x_meanfloat

The mean value of a Gaussian

sigmafloat

The Gaussian uncertainty

Returns:
gaussianlist

A list of Gaussian values.
